Body:
"""Test that we only accept supported MD engines."""
engine = detect_md_engine(arg)
assert engine.__name__ == out
pytest.mark.parametrize('arg, out', (('gromacs/2016.3',
    'mdbenchmark.mdengines.gromacs'), ('namd/123',
    'mdbenchmark.mdengines.namd'), ('NAMD/123',
    'mdbenchmark.mdengines.namd'), ('NamD/123',
    'mdbenchmark.mdengines.namd'), ('GROMACS/123',
    'mdbenchmark.mdengines.gromacs'), ('GRomacS/123',
    'mdbenchmark.mdengines.gromacs')))
